This file contains the list of all possible error codes which are used in this Arduino firmware Florian Frank 1.0
Invalid index e.g invalid row or column is chosen
NO_ERROR INVALID_INDEX INVALID_MESSAGE INTERFACE_CLOSED INVALID_LENGTH INVALID_BUFFER_LEN INVALID_ARGUMENT INVALID_COMMAND DISCONNECTED NOT_INITIALIZED
This array contains the possible commands accepted by the control protocol

This file contains the functionality to control the serial connection to the control computer It contains functionality to send and receive messages Florian Frank 1.0

Header file containing the physical Pins used to control the ADG726 Multiplexer Header file containing the physical Pins used to control the ADG726 Multiplexer Florian Frank 1.0 Multiplexer 2 U4 Pin of the Chip Select Signal for channel A Row Selector Florian Frank 1.0 Multiplexer 2 U4 Pin of the Chip Select Signal for channel A Row Selector
Pin for the Write Enable Signal of the multiplexer Pin for the Write Enable Signal of the multiplexer
Pin for the Enable Signal of the multiplexer
This class is responsible for controlling an ADG726 Multiplexer The row is set by controlling
Selects a row without physically switching the multiplexer column column to select NO_ERROR if index is valid otherwise INVALID_INDEX is returned
Selects a column without physically switching the multiplexer column column to select NO_ERROR if index is valid otherwise INVALID_INDEX is returned
Deselect all rows and columns set CS EN and WE of both multiplexers to low
Sets the physical pins to set a row via the multiplexer 2 U11
Sets the physical pins to set a row via the multiplexer 1 U4
Sets the Chip enable signal muxChannel select either multiplexer 1 or multiplexer 2

This method writes the row and column by forwarding the commands to the two multiplexers A switch operation is only executed when the previous index changes NO_ERROR if no error occurred otherwise return error code
Constructor sets the maximum number of rows and columns
Initialization function enables the pin modes and initializes all lines to its default values

This function transforms an error code to a error message as string errCode error code to convert error message as string No error occurred Invalid row or column index chosen Format of received message is invalid UART interface is already closed TODO invalid length The length of the buffer is invalid Argument is invalid for current command Command is invalid UART connection is already closed Trying to apply a function on an uninitialized object
This file contains all possible commands which are connected with a Message object Florian Frank 1.0
CONNECT DISCONNECT SELECT_ROW SELECT_COLUMN ACK ERROR_CODE NOPE

This function runs the de-initialization functions of the multiplexer as well as the serial interface handler NO_ERROR if no error occurred otherwise an error code is returned
This function runs the initialization functions of the multiplexer as well as the serial interface handler NO_ERROR if no error occurred otherwise an error code is returned
The constructor initializes the controller for ADG726 multiplexer and enables the serial interface handler with an Baudrate
The destructor deletes the multiplexer controller as well as the serial interface handler allocated on the heap

This method contains the main loop of the firmware executed on the Arduino Here data is read from the UART interface parsed and the commands are forwarded to the multiplexer to control the darlington arrays NO_ERROR if no error occurred otherwise return an error code

This method forwards a Select Row or Select Column command to the ADG726 switch matrix command could be or message The message contains the row or column to select NO_ERROR if no error occurred otherwise return an error code

This file contains the functionality to transform messages into binary data and vise versa This allows to transform data into a readable format and into data which can be transmitted for example over an serial interface Florian Frank 1.0

ArduinoMainController ArduinoMainController uint8_t baudrate ErrorCode Init ErrorCode DeInit ErrorCode Loop ErrorCode SetRowColumn Command command Message message
Initialization of the Arduino Nano as well as the Switch Matrix

This file is the starting point of the Arduino firmware similar to a main file It consists of a setup phase where the Switch Matrix and Arduino is initialized and a continuous loop where commands are parsed and forwarded to the switch matrix Florian Frank 1.0
Loop in which the commands are parsed and forwarded to the Switch Matrix
Index indicate that no row is chosen
This file contains the functionality to set the row and column from the relais by controlling the ADG726 multiplexer Florian Frank 1.0 Allowed range for the Row Index
Index indicate that no column is chosen
Allowed range for the Column Index Index 1 3 indicates that no column is chosen
